content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetCredentials path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/storage/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/users/{user_id}/credentials content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get credentials
responses
200

type obj
credentials
type arr
getcredentialsresponsecredential

type str
desc the id for the access key
desc storage credentials for a user
desc the list of active credentials on account
desc a response with new credentials
title: 31_User Credentials_GetCredentials_175.json
